text: @senatemajldr Your Russian ties are showing. All you do is attack @TheDemocrats 24/7 instead of fighting #COVID19. You are a Russian asset. Your are committing treason to help Russia. You have killed US Citizens on purpose. You must be tried for crimes against humanity. @UN @NATO @SenSchumer
